DOC.brief_title: EGFR Mutations ctDNA Patients With Advanced NSCLC
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm stage IIIB/IV NSCLC ; Patient receive ≤ 1 prior systemic chemotherapy regimen ; Provision blood ( plasma ) sample ctDNA test ; Patient must able comply protocol ; Prior receive ≥2 systemic chemotherapy regimens ; As judged investigator , evidence severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( e.g . unstable uncompensated respiratory , cardiac , hepatic renal disease ) ; Histologically confirm small cell lung cancer metastatic tumor ; Patient histologic cytological diagnosis ;
